attributes.action: End red list hotel quarantine for double vaccinated and allow home quarantine
attributes.additional_details: If this vaccine is protecting people then why should we be forced to stay in a hotel when we can self isolate at home.
attributes.background: End the forced quarantine in hotel for red list countries if double vaccinated. Instead home quarantine and self isolation

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition which is currently open on this topic:

Allow fully vaccinated people coming from red list countries to isolate at home
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588072
